subtitle: maujūdah ḥalāt ke pas manẓar men̲.
title: Ramī jimār ke auqāt aur miná men̲ shab guzārī
subjects: Islamic law -- Interpretation and construction -- Congresses
Muslim pilgrims and pilgrimages -- Saudi Arabia -- Mecca -- Congresses

description.value: Decisions and articles on staying at Miná, Saudi Arabia during Hajj (Muslim pilgrims and pilgrimages) with special reference to current situation and according to Islamic Jurisprudence; contributed articles presented at a seminar organized by Islāmik Fiqh Akaiḍmī.

notes.value:
"Sūlhvīn fiqhī simīnār munʻaqidah Dārulʻulūm Muhaz̲z̲abpūr, Aʻẓamgaṛh muʼrk̲h̲ah 30 Mārc tā 2 Aprīl 2007 ke ek mauz̤ūʻ "ramī jimār ke auqāt aur miná ke bāhar ḥudūd-i ḥaram men̲ qiyām" ke silsile men̲ ʻUlamā-yi Hind kā faiṣlah, nīz us men̲ pesh kiʼe gaʼe maqālāt va munāqishāt kā majmūʻah."

Includes bibliographical references.

In Urdu; includes passages in Arabic.
